item.description:
We will plan to meet in Monument Square in Concord Center at 10:00 AM on Sunday 10/23/2011 for a ride out along Rt. 62 and 225 where there are very few stop lights and some nice scenic country roads. We'll find someplace to stop for a light breakfast, brunch or lunch. I've cross posted this planned ride with MASSRABS and the Metrowest Motorcycle Riders so there will be a mixture of motorcyles and scooters in the group. Most roads will have speeds bewteen 25-45 MPH and no highways.

This is cross posted on Twist and Go and has 5 RSVPs.
item.name: Let's Meetup in Concord Center on Route 62 For a Sunday Morning Ride 10/23/2011
